author: tabish
msg: Fixed the DataInputStream, DataOutputStream and OpenwireStringSupport classes to all read and write correct modified UTF-8 strings for all ascii values 0-255.   OpenwireStringSupport now correctly write the data with an int size prefix to support larger strings enabling primitive maps to store strings larger than 65535 characters.

author: faywang
msg: OPENJPA-1024: support case expression in subquery

author: clement
msg: Composite now exports the iPOJO manipulator.

author: clement
msg: Fix a NPE in the manipulator when a synthetized method is not found (during annotations migration).
